ygData.subject: Re: VARIOUS THOUGHTS
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all! I ll share my insights on these items... ... Before the Sunderings (back in P3 & P4), there was a bard in Qeynos who would make instruements for you
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all!

I'll share my insights on these items...


>B: I was wondering about the instrument pieces.

Before the Sunderings (back in P3 & P4), there was a bard in Qeynos who
would make instruements for you if you provided the pieces. I know he could
make a flute, at least, and I think a trumpet or lute as well. Anyhow, he
now says that he's out of the flute making business.

I've also heard the rumor that gnomes can tinker instruments and I'm VERY
VERY interested in this. If anyone knows anything, please share.


>C: Often when I play my songs my music sounds very strange. I was
>wondering if any others have experienced this. It definately sounds as if
>my Mandolin is out of tune, which would give credence to the usefullness of
>Lute Tuners.

Lute Tuners aren't for tuning the lute in that fashion; they are, in fact,
the knobs that hold the strings that you turn to tune a lute. So, they are
a lute part, to be used in the construction of a lute, not in the
enhancement of one.

-----------------------------------------------------
Jythri, Pencerdd of The Soerbaird
http://www.soerbaird.com
